players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I'm shocked Alice is gone. We need to be careful and share any info we have."
Diana: "I'm also shocked about Alice. We should all share where we were last night to help find the mafia."
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and found out they are the mafia."
Charlie: "Bob is lying. I'm the detective and I investigated Diana last night - she's innocent. Bob must be the mafia trying to frame me."
Diana: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Diana instead of Alice? That doesn't make sense. Bob's claim seems more credible."
You: "Charlie is the mafia. I investigated him last night and confirmed it. He's trying to deflect by claiming to be the detective and falsely accusing Diana."
